title: Optimal AI Restaurant Menu Scanning Demo
content: When Optimal AI calculated my macros in seconds I almost dropped my phone 📱 This is wild! showing how Optimal AI helps with restaurant menu scanning
caption: When Optimal AI calculated my macros in seconds I almost dropped my phone 📱 This is wild! #OptimalAI #CalorieTracking #health_conscious
